participants.name: Jean Claude Habimana
participants.bio: Hardware engineer passionate about IoT solutions for road safety. Winner of codeXtreme 2025 with L-Guard smart helmet system.

participants.name: Alice Uwase
participants.bio: AI/ML engineer focused on healthcare applications. Developed Ndimension, an AI-powered diagnostic tool for rural healthcare.

participants.name: Eric Mugisha
participants.bio: Full-stack developer with expertise in fintech solutions. Created Aguka Pay, a mobile payment platform for farmers.

participants.name: Diane Nsabimana
participants.bio: EdTech enthusiast and software engineer. Passionate about making education accessible through technology.

participants.name: Patrick Niyonzima
participants.bio: Data scientist and AI researcher. Interested in using ML to solve African challenges in agriculture and climate.

participants.name: Marie Claire Umutoni
participants.bio: Cybersecurity specialist and ethical hacker. Focused on building secure systems for African businesses.

participants.name: Kevin Nkurunziza
participants.bio: Mobile app developer specializing in Android and iOS. Building apps that connect communities and solve local problems.

participants.name: Grace Uwera
participants.bio: Cloud architect and DevOps engineer. Passionate about building scalable infrastructure for African startups.
